title: Doesn't Fiddlesticks feel overloaded?
body:
at max rank his silence does so much damage and you can't do anything for 1.25 seconds 

he then fears you for 2.25 seconds making you useles for 3.50 seconds total, all the while doing damage with his drain

i'm not calling for nerfs or saying he's broken but i just wanted to see what everyone else thinks :p

replies.body: yes a really squishy champ who is depended on blue buff as a jungler and has a weak 1 vs 1 dueling power and his ult is easily counter-able is so broken
When the hell did I say he was broken? Did you even read the post? No need to be a dick I just wanted to know what everyone thought

Doesn't Fiddlesticks feel overloaded

lol 

i told you what i thought... it wasnt being a dick.. you dont like what i said and you add context and tone to it as you saw fit...
No, on the grounds of the term "overloaded".  There's nothing in Fiddlestick's kit that suggests it is overloaded.
a silence fear and a drain and an ult that lets you gank outta nowhere, i'm not complaining js

But that's not "overloaded".  That's what I am saying. Each ability are just one simple function.  I'ld like to note that they serve specific functions in allowing fiddlestick's odd kit and method of doing damage to function.

An "overloaded" champion is a champion with multiple functions stacked onto their abilities, and have things 3+ passives.  Champions where they have a wide array of strengths and abilities jammed onto them for little good reason.

That isn't overloaded. Overloaded means the champion has a bunch of random crap in their kit, to the point the champion is able to fulfill multiple roles and sometimes even better than champions that designed for that specific role. I swear, the day people stop tossing words they don't know the meaning of around, is the day I dance naked down Sheriff Street while singing YMCA.
Most of his damage comes from his ult since his drain is easily stopped. Yea he can silence you and fear you but you can still just run away to get out of his short range.
He can't drain for those 3.5 seconds because it is a channel and he has to cast the fear.
